original_text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples, he gave them power against unclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease.
korean_text: 예수께서 그의 열두 제자를 부르사 더러운 귀신을 쫓아내며 모든 병과 모든 약한 것을 고치는 권능을 주시니라

sentences.original_text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 열두 제자들을 불렀을 때,

sentences.original_text: he gave them power against unclean spirits,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 더러운 영을 대항할 권능을 주셨고,

sentences.original_text: and to heal all manner of sickness
